<h3 id="X21659">X(21659)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-WASAT TO MACBEATH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (-a^2+b^2+c^2)*(2*a^8-2*(b^2+c^2)*a^6-(b^2-c^2)^2*a^4+(b^2-c^2)^4)  :  :
<p class="bold">
X(21659) = 3*X(4)-2*X(13419) = 3*X(51)-2*X(3575) = 9*X(51)-8*X(11745) = 3*X(51)-4*X(12241) = 3*X(185)-4*X(18914) = 9*X(373)-8*X(9825) = 2*X(389)-3*X(12022) = 3*X(3575)-4*X(11745) = 3*X(6146)-2*X(18914) = X(6240)-3*X(12022) = 2*X(11745)-3*X(12241) = X(12289)+2*X(13403) = 3*X(12289)+2*X(13419) = 4*X(13292)-3*X(14831) = 3*X(13403)-X(13419)
</p>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).
</p>
<p>
Let A'B'C' be the triangle described in ADGEOM #2697 (8/26/2015, Tran Quang Hung).  X(21659) is the A'B'C'-to-ABC similarity image of X(4). (Randy Hutson, August 29, 2018)
</p>
<p>
X(21659) lies on these lines:
{2,12278}, {3,125}, {4,54}, {5,13367}, {6,12173}, {20,1204}, {24,18390}, {25,17845}, {30,52}, {49,5448}, {51,3575}, {113,156}, {115,14585}, {235,1495}, {287,6655}, {373,9825}, {378,18381}, {381,19357}, {382,1181}, {389,6240}, {403,10282}, {427,11572}, {511,12225}, {539,18436}, {542,12111}, {550,13470}, {576,3146}, {631,18918}, {974,11565}, {1092,12118}, {1147,1568}, {1425,7354}, {1503,1885}, {1562,7748}, {1593,11550}, {1594,11430}, {1657,10605}, {1853,3516}, {1879,14533}, {2072,12038}, {2777,6241}, {2904,11456}, {3070,21640}, {3071,21641}, {3269,7756}, {3270,6284}, {3357,11457}, {3448,11440}, {3520,20299}, {3521,15002}, {3529,18909}, {3534,17712}, {3567,18559}, {3611,6253}, {3613,15619}, {3830,19347}, {3845,15807}, {3917,12362}, {5254,8779}, {5318,21647}, {5321,21648}, {5339,8738}, {5340,8737}, {5480,21637}, {5562,12605}, {5651,6816}, {5876,15532}, {5889,10112}, {5893,13473}, {5907,14516}, {5944,10113}, {5972,11449}, {6000,18560}, {6243,10938}, {6689,14805}, {6756,16657}, {7503,8907}, {7505,11202}, {7507,11425}, {7526,18474}, {7547,18376}, {7576,10110}, {7577,18394}, {7687,11464}, {8550,21639}, {9707,12140}, {9820,10297}, {10024,18475}, {10116,18562}, {10125,11801}, {10151,16252}, {10182,14644}, {10733,13198}, {10982,18494}, {11245,13568}, {11403,19459}, {11438,18912}, {11468,20417}, {11591,15738}, {12134,15030}, {12233,13366}, {12943,19349}, {12953,19354}, {13352,18569}, {13434,18428}, {13474,16659}, {13488,16655}, {13754,18563}, {14927,18935}, {15072,19481}, {15463,19506}, {17538,18931}, {17824,19504}, {18128,18565}, {19205,21638}, {19498,21642}</p>
<p>
X(21659) = midpoint of X(4) and X(12289)<br>
X(21659) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 13403), (382, 12897), (550, 13470), (5562, 12605), (5889, 10112)<br>
X(21659) = complement of X(12278)<br>
X(21659) = X(12289)-of-Euler triangle<br>
X(21659) = X(13403)-of-anti-Euler triangle<br>
X(21659) = X(17845)-of-anti-Ara triangle<br>
X(21659) = X(3869)-of-orthic-triangle if ABC is acute<br>
X(21659) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 265, 5449), (4, 54, 18388), (4, 578, 3574), (4, 12254, 1614), (4, 19467, 184), (20, 1899, 1204), (20, 18945, 1899), (49, 18403, 5448), (184, 19467, 10619), (1147, 18404, 1568), (3575, 12241, 51), (6240, 12022, 389), (11430, 18383, 1594), (12118, 18531, 1092), (13367, 13851, 5)<br>
</p>
<hr class="gray">
